edu.harvard.integer.service.topology

Interface TopologyManagerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseManagerInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TopologyManagerLocalInterface, TopologyManagerRemoteInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopologyManager

    public interface TopologyManagerInterface
extends BaseManagerInterface
